name: part_004
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Otonose Kanade and Hiiragi Kanda performing the song 'Say Say Say' on a neon-lit stage.
The stage transitions to a more intimate setting as Otonose Kanade prepares to play the acoustic guitar.
Otonose Kanade performs '奏 (かなで)' solo while playing the acoustic guitar.

subtitles.original: ...明日は何しようか
subtitles.english: ...what should we do tomorrow?

subtitles.original: 暇なら分かり合おうぜ
subtitles.english: If we're free, let's understand each other.

subtitles.original: ねぇ考えなくてもいいよ
subtitles.english: Hey, you don't have to think about it.

subtitles.original: 踊り始めた君の細胞
subtitles.english: Your cells have started to dance.

subtitles.original: この音に今は乗ろうよ
subtitles.english: Let's ride this sound for now.

subtitles.original: 乗れなくてもいいよ Oh
subtitles.english: It's okay if you can't, oh.

subtitles.original: 思い出の景色でバックパック
subtitles.english: Backpacking through landscapes of memories.

subtitles.original: 春風のざわめきでグルーヴ
subtitles.english: Grooving with the rustle of the spring breeze.

subtitles.original: もっと二人で歌おうよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing more together.

subtitles.original: 暇なら愛をしようよ
subtitles.english: If we're free, let's make love.

subtitles.original: さぁ 息を吸って
subtitles.english: Now, take a breath,

subtitles.original: 声に出して
subtitles.english: and speak out.

subtitles.original: Say Say 歌ってようぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's keep singing.

subtitles.original: 笑われてるのも仕方がないね
subtitles.english: It can't be helped if we're being laughed at.

subtitles.original: 何もかも間違ってんのさ
subtitles.english: Everything is just wrong.

subtitles.original: Say Say 楽していこうぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's take it easy.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿よそう 泥沼じゃないぜ
subtitles.english: Stop being a fool, it's not a quagmire.

subtitles.original: 同じような歌詞だし
subtitles.english: The lyrics are similar, so

subtitles.original: 3番は飛ばしていいよ
subtitles.english: you can skip the third verse.

subtitles.original: さぁ 息を吸って
subtitles.english: Now, take a breath,

subtitles.original: 早く吐いて
subtitles.english: and quickly breathe out.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 心を貸して
subtitles.english: Hey, lend me your heart,

subtitles.original: 今日ぐらいは
subtitles.english: at least for today.

subtitles.original: Say Say 歌ってようぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's keep singing.

subtitles.original: 違うか お前らみんな 僕のこと笑ってるのか
subtitles.english: Or am I wrong? Are you all laughing at me?

subtitles.original: Say Say 楽していこうぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's take it easy.

subtitles.original: 死ぬほど辛い 悩みなどそうさ
subtitles.english: That's right, worries that are painfully difficult...

subtitles.original: 数年も経てばきっと 一人も覚えてないよ
subtitles.english: After a few years, surely no one will remember.

subtitles.original: Say Say 歌ってようぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's keep singing.

subtitles.original: 体は動く お前はどうだい
subtitles.english: The body moves, how about you?

subtitles.original: 愛の歌歌ってんのさ
subtitles.english: I'm singing a song of love.

subtitles.original: Say Say 楽していこうぜ
subtitles.english: Say say, let's take it easy.

subtitles.original: 死ぬほどのことなど この世にないぜ
subtitles.english: There's nothing in this world worth dying for.

subtitles.original: 明日は何しようか
subtitles.english: What should we do tomorrow?

subtitles.original: 暇なら笑い合おうぜ
subtitles.english: If we're free, let's laugh together.

subtitles.original: そのうち分かり合おうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's understand each other soon.

subtitles.original: 奏 (かなで)
subtitles.english: Kanade

subtitles.original: 改札の前 つなぐ手と手
subtitles.english: In front of the ticket gate, holding hands.

subtitles.original: いつものざわめき 新しい風
subtitles.english: The usual bustle, a new breeze.

subtitles.original: 明るく見送るはずだったのに
subtitles.english: I was supposed to see you off cheerfully, but...

subtitles.original: うまく笑えずに 君を見ていた
subtitles.english: I couldn't smile properly while looking at you.

subtitles.original: 君が大人になってく その季節が
subtitles.english: The season when you become an adult,

subtitles.original: 悲しい歌で溢れないように
subtitles.english: So that it won't be filled with sad songs,

subtitles.original: 最後に何か君に伝えたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to tell you something at the end,

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」に代わる言葉を僕は探してた
subtitles.english: I was looking for words to replace "goodbye".

subtitles.original: 君の手を引く...
subtitles.english: Pulling your hand...
